note: Thirty-something sci-fi 🛸 and gamer 👾 geek. Current gaming obsession is my Steam Deck, but also have a Switch and Series X. Am a Whovian 💙💙, worker at Planet Express 🚀and Boy from the Dwarf 🪐.
